message: Hello Bob, I have a great product for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do a bit better than $90, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $125?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $125. Can you meet me at $100?
I understand you're trying to save some money, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $110?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to save some money. Can you meet me at $95?
I'm starting to think we're getting a bit far apart. How about we meet at $115?
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $115. Can you meet me at $92?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $108?
